title: RBI monetary policy: Repo rate unchanged, growth outlook revised— 5 key highlights from RBI MPC outcome
description:
RBI monetary policy: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on Wednesday, October 1, maintained a status quo on repo rate and policy stance, highlighting India's favourable growth-inflation dynamics.

Meeting Street expectations, RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra-led Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) kept the rep...
